original: nanu bhagavā kāruṇiko lokahito lokānukampako lokatthacaroti?
analyzed: nanu bhagavā kāruṇikaḥ loka hitaḥ loka anukampakaḥ lokattha caroti

original: Hañci bhagavā kāruṇiko lokahito lokānukampako lokatthacaro, no ca vata re vattabbe—
analyzed: hañci bhagavā kāruṇikaḥ loka hitaḥ loka anukampakaḥ lokattha caraḥ no ca vata re vattabbe
natthi buddhassa bhagavato karuṇā ati pe
nanu bhagavā mahā karuṇā samāpattim samāpajji iti

original: Hañci bhagavā mahākaruṇāsamāpattiṁ samāpajji, no ca vata re vattabbe—
analyzed: hañci bhagavā mahā karuṇā samāpattim samāpajji no ca vata re vattabbe

original: Tena hi natthi buddhassa bhagavato karuṇāti.
analyzed: tena hi na atthi buddhassa bhagavataḥ karuṇā ati
